name: Calamitous Strike
description: The lands were forged through storm, frost, and flame, which all must be kept in harmony to avoid calamity.
effect: Devotees of the Keepers of the Elements may call upon 'Calamitous Strike' once per quest as a bonus action during their combat turn, allowing them to change the typing of their move to Ice, Electric, or Fire, and applying a STAB bonus as if the move matched the user's typing. At Luminary, gain +1 STAB bonus. At Paragon, gain +2.
